TEXT.TITLE: METALLGESELLSCHAFT AG <METG.F>
TEXT.BODY: Year to September 30, 1986 Domestic group net profit 69.9 mln marks vs 61.4 mln. Parent net profit 53.6 mln vs 43.8 mln. Dividend six marks vs same. Parent payment to disclosed reserves 20 mln vs 15 mln. REUTER
